code: import{AdvancedMap}from'../../../../../core/utils/AdvancedMap';export class UnseenItemsParser{constructor(){this._items=void 0;}flush(){this._items=new AdvancedMap();return true;}parse(wrapper){if(!wrapper)return false;let totalUnseen=wrapper.readInt();while(totalUnseen>0){const category=wrapper.readInt();let totalItems=wrapper.readInt();const itemIds=[];while(totalItems>0){itemIds.push(wrapper.readInt());totalItems--;}this._items.add(category,itemIds);totalUnseen--;}return true;}getItemsByCategory(category){return this._items.getValue(category);}get categories(){return this._items.getKeys();}}
